definition: private business/opposite: state-owned enterprise 國有企業|国有企业[guo2 you3 qi3 ye4]
camp/barracks/battalion/to build/to operate/to manage/to strive for
to plan a project/to stand on tiptoe/Taiwan pr. [qi4]/abbr. for 企業|企业[qi3 ye4]
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

sentences.english: As has been the case before, the military can be a trailblazer for the private sector.
sentences.chinese: 跟以往一樣，美軍可爲私營企業開創道路。

sentences.english: Last month there were over a thousand bankruptcies in the private sector.
sentences.chinese: 上個月有上千個私營企業破產。

sentences.english: In 1998, the enterprise was reformed into a private-owned enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 一九九八年改製爲私營企業。

sentences.english: Private entrepreneurships were introduced and many countryside villagers were moving to the cities to earn money.
sentences.chinese: 私營企業被引入，許多農村居民湧向城市去淘金。

sentences.english: But, the party of the private enterprise builds the job very incommensurate however this kind of change.
sentences.chinese: 但是，私營企業的黨建工作卻很不適應這種變化。

sentences.english: Home World, which opened its first store in 1997, is a privately held domestic company.
sentences.chinese: 家世界的第一家店於1997年開業，爲私營企業。

sentences.english: HEC will begin marketing its China-based M.B.A. to the private sector next year.
sentences.chinese: HEC明年將開始向私營企業推廣該項目。

sentences.english: Article 31 The private enterprise shall institute an eight-hour working day system.
sentences.chinese: 一條私營企業實行八小時工作制。

sentences.english: A private-enterprise economy is characterized by private property and rights concerned.
sentences.chinese: 私營企業的經濟以有關的私人財產和權利爲特點。

sentences.english: to guide associations of self-employed businesses and associations of private enterprises in their operations.
sentences.chinese: 指導個體勞動者協會私營企業協會的工作。

sentences.english: The fact that it started out as a private enterprise is not surprising.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，它由私營企業起頭建造並不出奇。

sentences.english: The private sector should have access to these discounted drugs under the AAI.
sentences.chinese: 私營企業應有權依據AAI計劃獲得這些優惠藥物。

sentences.english: I am Xinjiang Korla Tianshan food products factory factory manager, private enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 我是新疆庫爾勒天山食品廠廠長，私營企業。

sentences.english: But of these, just 82 are privately owned.
sentences.chinese: 然而這其中，只有82家是私營企業。

sentences.english: But for most private firms, the delay can be interminable.
sentences.chinese: 然而對大多私營企業，延遲是冗長的。

definition: the catering industry/the hotel and restaurant business
public utility/state-run enterprise/public foundation or enterprise, often charitable
